name: Ultimate Sniper Survival
description:
The best shooting games experience you will have on your mobile. Get this FPS shooting experience with sniper rifle as military duty begins in army sniper war game to combat counter terrorists. You’ve already experienced many sniper shooting games with best action and sniping, now is the time to play as the the real hero of Ultimate Sniper Survival. Ultimate Sniper Survival will let you experience counter attack missions where the ultimate task is the need to fight against the enemy terrorist in sniper shooting game of US army.

Features of Ultimate Sniper Survival:
• Realistic Environment.
• Thrilling action levels.
• New and latest Sniper 3D Guns.
• High quality graphics and best sound effects
• HD Graphics.
• Sniper Training to be the Best Shooter
